scripts.start: npm run prepare && cp index-dev.html public/index.html && npm run web
scripts.start:webxdc: npm run prepare:webxdc && cp index-dev.html public/index.html && npm run webxdc
scripts.build: npm run prepare && npm run browserify
scripts.build:webxdc: npm run prepare:webxdc && npm run browserify:webxdc
scripts.prepare: cp -n config.default.json config.json && npm run prepare:public && npm run prepare:style && npm run prepare:wasm
scripts.prepare:webxdc: cp -n config.webxdc.json config.json && npm run prepare:public && npm run prepare:style && npm run prepare:wasm
scripts.browserify:webxdc: browserify -p [ tinyify --ecmaVersion 10 ] -r ./storage/backend-webxdc.js:./backend app.js | indexhtmlify --title 'peermaps (webxdc)' > public/index.html && rm -f peermaps.xdc && zip -j -r peermaps.xdc public/ && echo '>> public/ folder disk size' && du -sh public && echo '>> peermaps.xdc size' && wc -c peermaps.xdc
